file_content.text: [As soon as you touch the stone, you smell something seeping into the room.]
Small hunter, I scent--yes, is cyanogen gas. Poison. Will not harm me, but you....
[It smells like cyanogen gas, an often-deadly poison.]
[The smell of gas is getting worse. Already it is becoming difficult to breathe.]
I will not die without a fight!
[As your blow hits, the smell of cyanogen gas begins to fade.]
[After a minute or two, you can breathe easily again.]
There must be a switch or lever somewhere.
[As you search, the smell of gas grows stronger, and you pass out.]
I will not be afraid. I can survive this.
[You suffer the cyanogen gas for several minutes before it recedes.]
[Your Jedi training has kept you alive, but you feel deathly ill.]
